solution_line_template: Athlete 2 ran the relay race for {athlete_1_time} + {athlete_2_more_than_1} = <<{athlete_1_time}+{athlete_2_more_than_1}={athlete_2_time}>>{athlete_2_time} seconds.
While athlete 4 finished the relay race for {athlete_1_time} - {athlete_4_less_than_1} = <<{athlete_1_time}-{athlete_4_less_than_1}={athlete_4_time}>>{athlete_4_time} seconds.

So,It take them {athlete_1_time} + {athlete_2_time} + {athlete_3_time} + {athlete_4_time} = <<{athlete_1_time}+{athlete_2_time}+{athlete_3_time}+{athlete_4_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} seconds to they finish the relay race.
